about_the_game: This is a game where "you design games for AI players to play". You will play the role of a clerk working in an arcade workshop. Every day, all kinds of customers will come. They might be students who have just finished school or workers who have just got off work. Their demands for games vary. And your task is to magically modify various classic arcade games, give play to your creativity and design unique levels to see if you can meet their requirements. Their favorable comments will bring you generous rewards. If their requirements are not met, in the face of your various creative designs, how will the AI players respond?

short_description: An AI-driven creative game. As an arcade workshop clerk, you'll face AI customers with diverse demands. Your task is to modify classic games , adjust game levels to meet customers' needs, and with the manager's help, expand and strengthen the arcade workshop.
